item.title: Sounds Of Christmas - Step into Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Easy
Step Into Christmas - Elton John
The audio has been adjusted to suit better ukulele chords
Using the chords: A7 C C7 Dm D7 F G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU but some variations which are shown in video
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Sounds Of Christmas - Do They Know Its Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along of Do They Know It's Christmas as recorded for Band Aid in 1984. Written by Bob Geldof and Midge Ure.
Using the chords: C F G Am Dm C7
Strum Pattern: D DU U DU works for most of the song, you might want to try D DU D DU towards the end of the song.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
